00049 //
00050 // KeyfileFieldListIterator
00051 //
00052 // 10 January 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_FIELDLISTITERATOR_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_FIELDLISTITERATOR_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/Extent.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/FieldListDiskBlockReader.hpp"
00060 #include "lemur/File.hpp"
00061 #include "lemur/ReadBuffer.hpp"
00062 
00063 #define INDRI_FIELDLISTITERATOR_BUFFERSIZE (1024*1024)
00064 
00065 namespace indri {
00066   namespace index {
00067 
00068     struct FieldExtentInfo {
00069       int documentID;
00070       greedy_vector<Extent> extents;
00071       greedy_vector<INT64> numbers;
00072     };
00073 
00074     class FieldListIterator {
00075     private:
00076       FieldListDiskBlockReader _reader;
00077       FieldExtentInfo _info;
00078       bool _finished;
00079       bool _hasMore;
00080       bool _numeric;
00081 
00082       File& _file;
00083       ReadBuffer _readBuffer;
00084 
00085       bool _fetchNextBlock() {
00086         const char* nextBlock = _readBuffer.read( INDRI_FIELDLIST_BLOCKSIZE );
00087 
00088         if( !nextBlock )
00089           return false;
00090 
00091         _reader.setBlock( nextBlock );
00092         _reader.next();
00093         return true;
00094       }
00095 
00096       void _fetchDocument( int documentID, bool& endBlock ) {
00097         if( _numeric ) {
00098           _fetchDocumentNumeric( documentID, endBlock );
00099         } else {
00100           _fetchDocumentNonNumeric( documentID, endBlock );
00101         }
00102       }
00103 
00104       void _fetchDocumentNonNumeric( int documentID, bool& endBlock ) {
00105         endBlock = false;
00106 
00107         if( documentID != _reader.document() )
00108           return;
00109 
00110         _info.extents.push_back( _reader.extent() );
00111 
00112         while( _reader.next() ) {
00113           if( _reader.document() != documentID )
00114             return;
00115 
00116           _info.extents.push_back( _reader.extent() );
00117         }
00118 
00119         endBlock = true;
00120       }
00121 
00122       void _fetchDocumentNumeric( int documentID, bool& endBlock ) {
00123         endBlock = false;
00124 
00125         if( documentID != _reader.document() )
00126           return;
00127 
00128         _info.extents.push_back( _reader.extent() );
00129         _info.numbers.push_back( _reader.number() );
00130 
00131         while( _reader.next() ) {
00132           if( _reader.document() != documentID )
00133             return;
00134 
00135           _info.extents.push_back( _reader.extent() );
00136           _info.numbers.push_back( _reader.number() );
00137         }
00138 
00139         endBlock = true;
00140       }
00141 
00142     public:
00143       FieldListIterator( File& fieldListFile, bool numeric ) :
00144         _file( fieldListFile ),
00145         _readBuffer( fieldListFile, INDRI_FIELDLISTITERATOR_BUFFERSIZE, false ),
00146         _numeric(numeric)
00147       {
00148       }
00149 
00150       void startIteration() {
00151         _hasMore = true;
00152         _readBuffer.seekg( 0, std::fstream::beg );
00153         _info.documentID = -1;
00154         _finished = !_fetchNextBlock();
00155       }
00156 
00157       bool hasMore() {
00158         return _hasMore;
00159       }
00160 
00161       const FieldExtentInfo* currentEntry() {
00162         if( !_finished )
00163           return &_info;
00164         
00165         return 0;
00166       }
00167 
00168       const FieldExtentInfo* nextEntry() {
00169         if( _finished )
00170           return 0;
00171 
00172         if( !_hasMore ) {
00173           _finished = true;
00174           return 0;
00175         }
00176 
00177         // reader is pointing to next document ID already
00178         int documentID = _reader.document();
00179         _info.documentID = documentID;
00180         _info.extents.clear();
00181         _info.numbers.clear();
00182         bool atEndOfBlock;
00183 
00184         _fetchDocument( documentID, atEndOfBlock );
00185 
00186         while( atEndOfBlock ) {
00187           if( ! _fetchNextBlock() ) {
00188             _hasMore = false;
00189             return &_info;
00190           }
00191 
00192           _fetchDocument( documentID, atEndOfBlock );
00193         }
00194 
00195         return &_info;
00196       }
00197 
00198       const FieldExtentInfo* nextEntry( int documentID ) {
00199         if( _finished )
00200           return 0;
00201 
00202         if( documentID <= _info.documentID )
00203           return &_info;
00204 
00205         if( !_hasMore ) {
00206           _finished = true;
00207           return 0;
00208         }
00209 
00210         // we can skip blocks that only have documents that
00211         // we aren't interested in
00212         while( _reader.lastDocument() < documentID ) {
00213           if( ! _fetchNextBlock() ) {
00214             _finished = true;
00215             _hasMore = false;
00216             return 0;
00217           }
00218         }
00219 
00220         const FieldExtentInfo* info;
00221 
00222         // read each entry until we find one that matches, or until we're done
00223         for( info = nextEntry(); info && info->documentID < documentID; info = nextEntry() )
00224           ;
00225 
00226         return info;
00227       }
00228     };
00229   }
00230 }
00231 
00232 #endif // INDRI_FIELDLISTITERATOR_HPP
